full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Tender Title:** 4 Port Secure KVM Switch for the Department of Justice

**Reference Number:** SSC-24-00025384:T

**Publication Date:** February 7, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 22, 2024 at 00:00:00 hours

**Background:**
The Department of Justice requires a secure 4-port KVM switch to meet its operational needs. This procurement is being managed by Shared Services Canada.

**Description of Requirement:**

The Department of Justice requires a 4-port secure KVM switch, as outlined in the Statement of Requirement and List of Deliverables. The delivery destination is Ottawa, Ontario, and the expected delivery date is prior to March 28, 2024.

**Security Requirements:**
None

**Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements:**
None

**Procurement Details:**

*   Solicitation Number: 2BH3159022A
*   Procurement Type: Competitive - Open bidding
*   Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Regions of Opportunity: World
*   Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except National Capital Region)
*   Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada

**Contact Information:**

*   Procurement Officer: Corey Griffin
*   Email: Corey.griffin@ssc-spc.gc.ca
*   Address: 400 Cooper Street, 6th floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2H8

**Accessing the Solicitation:**
The solicitation can be accessed through the following link: <https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login>

**Language of Documents:**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Submission Guidelines:**

*   The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.
*   All enquiries related to this solicitation must be addressed in writing to the Procurement Officer.   ,  ###
